source:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_00<tab>Wiltwaek seems to be awaiting word from Chanene.

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>In order to complete this quest, you must have learned the advanced recipes contained within <var 1A 02 /var>Master Alchemist III<var 1A 01 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_00<tab>レヴナンツトールのウィルトウェークは、相棒からの通信を待っているようだ。

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>このクエストのコンプリートに必要な納品物を製作するためには、「錬成秘伝書:第3巻」の修得が必要です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_01<tab>Chanene has apparently found one of the missing people on the road south from Camp Revenant's Toll. Make your way there now.
target: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_01<tab>失踪者が発見されたとの急報が入った。モードゥナの崩壊したキャンプで、現地の「チャネネ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive to find a strange scene before you─one that Chanene's explanation does little to clarify. A single Lalafellin fellow was driving a carriage, and in the back were two barrels─of which the suspect claims no prior knowledge. Within these were two identical Hyuran men, one alive and one dead. The living one is silent, presumably in the same state as the Near Eastern youth you found earlier. Chanene is at wit's end but for a single lead: a cracked leather journal found on the dead man. In it, he speaks of a sister working in Tailfeather. Venture there now, and find out if the corpse had a twin.
target: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_02<tab>失踪者は、以前捕縛した「近東風の若者」と同じ自失状態で発見された。さらに「失踪者と瓜ふたつの別の男性の遺体」が発見され、事態は混迷の度合いを深める。解決の手がかりを得るため、高地ドラヴァニアのテイルフェザーで「失踪者の妹」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B2B01 /var>」を見せよう。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_03<tab>The dead man's sister informs you somewhat coldly that her brother─a brute by all report─had neither a twin nor identical friends. Return to Wiltwaek in Revenant's Toll with this puzzling piece of information.
target: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_03<tab>失踪者の妹は、兄とそっくりの男性に心あたりはないという。レヴナンツトールの「ウィルトウェーク」に報告し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B2B01 /var>」を返却しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_04<tab>In your absence, Wiltwaek has found a witness who testifies that he saw the Lalafellin suspect lift both barrels─bodies and all─into the back of the carriage. The culprit himself, however, denies this, saying he could not possibly perform such feats of strength. Neither Wiltwaek nor Chanene believe him innocent, and so ask that you brew a high-quality draconian potion of strength. Do so, that Chanene may drink it and test if a Lalafell aided by alchemy can lift so great a weight.

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>In order to complete this quest, you must have learned the advanced recipes contained within <var 1A 02 /var>Master Alchemist III<var 1A 01 /var>.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_04<tab>ウィルトウェークに報告した。事件の謎に迫るには、犯罪集団の一員とみられる、ララフェル族のならず者を自白に追い込むしかなさそうだ。犯行の有力な証拠となる錬金薬「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2314E01 /var>」を製作し、レヴナンツトールの「チャネネ」に納品しよう。

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2314E01 /var>」を製作するためには、「錬成秘伝書:第3巻」の修得が必要です。<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_05<tab>Chanene tosses down the potion and proceeds to carry the heavy barrels up the steps with ease. With his alibi disproved, the suspect tells you everything─how an aging alchemist hired him to move the bodies, and how the twin is in fact a “clone,” a living, breathing copy of the original. This mastermind has been stealing people from their beds to practice this process, apparently born of ancient Allag's ingenuity. The culprit also tells you that this man has no problem whatsoever with killing, and begs Wiltwaek for protection. With these new facts at your feet, Wiltwaek states with furrowed brow that you must capture this mastermind soon, or there will be further bloodshed.

※The next alchemist quest will be available from Wiltwaek upon reaching level 60.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SEQ_05<tab>チャネネに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2314E01 /var>を納品した。錬金薬を使えば犯行が可能だと証明され、ララフェル族のならず者は容疑を認めた。供述によると、失踪者と瓜ふたつの男性は、古代アラグの秘法により、元の男性とそっくりに作られた人造生命体「クローン」だという。ウィルトウェークらとともに事件の全貌を解き明かし、黒幕に裁きを下そう。

※錬金術師のレベルが60以上になると、レヴナンツトールのウィルトウェークから次の錬金術師クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Chanene near Camp Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_TODO_00<tab>崩壊したキャンプでチャネネと合流

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_TODO_01<tab>Show the cracked leather log to the victim's estranged sister at Tailfeather.
target: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_TODO_01<tab>テイルフェザーの失踪者の妹に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B2B01 /var>を見せる

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_TODO_02<tab>Return the cracked leather log to Wiltwaek.
target: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_TODO_02<tab>レヴナンツトールのウィルトウェークに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B2B01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a draconian potion of strength <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the draconian potion of strength <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Chanene)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2314E01 /var>を製作)) ((チャネネに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2314E01 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Good. I'm just waiting on Chanene. You see, once we learned our culprits' goal, combing through the facts─
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_000<tab>君のおかげで、犯罪集団の狙いが見えてきた！
有力な情報の絞り込みも、ぐっとやりやすくなってな……
チャネネとオレとで、寄せられた情報を精査しているところだ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_001<tab>Chanene? You found who? No, no, keep them all there─I'll come to you!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_001<tab>……チャネネか、どうした？
なに、失踪者を乗せたチョコボ・キャリッジが見つかった！？
わかった、準備ができ次第、オレも行く！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_002<tab>She found one of our missing people down the road from Camp Revenant's Toll. Are you coming?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_002<tab>君も現場に立ち会ってくれ！
場所はモードゥナの「崩壊したキャンプ」の南だ。
現地で、チャネネと合流するぞ！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_010<tab>Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, to the Fogfens!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_010<tab>君も現場に立ち会ってくれ！
場所はモードゥナの「崩壊したキャンプ」の南だ。
現地で、チャネネと合流するぞ！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_0015<tab>A carriage, a corpse, two casks, and two culprits. Not <var 1A 02 /var>quite<var 1A 01 /var> what I was expecting...
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_0015<tab>不審なチョコボ・キャリッジが発見された現場だ。
うさんくさいモンばかり、ゾロゾロ出てきやがったぞ！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CRIMINAL02068_000_0020<tab>See bloody reason, lass─I'm a <var 1A 02 /var>victim<var 1A 01 /var> here, not a criminal!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CRIMINAL02068_000_0020<tab>なんだテメェ！
俺は被害者だっつってんだろ！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_JOHNDOE2068_000_0020<tab>...
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_0040<tab>What a bloody mess! I'll start at the beginning. I came to investigate a report of a suspicious carriage, and found this fellow.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_0040<tab>……さて、これがどういう状況かを説明するのは、骨が折れるね。
まず怪しいチョコボ・キャリッジを見つけたって通報があったの。
踏み込んで最初に見つけたのが、そのララフェル族のならず者。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_0041<tab>I'll be hanged if he's not one of our criminals. But he denies everything, particularly that he knew two Hyurs were in his carriage. Both were stuffed into barrels, and one was dead.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_0041<tab>犯罪集団の構成員と睨んでるけど、本人は容疑を否認してる。
さらに樽の中から、ヒューラン族の男性がふたり発見されたんだ。
ひとりは、すでに亡くなってた……その遺体がそうだよ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_0042<tab>The corpse will likely yield more than the live one, who's silent as the grave.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_0042<tab>で、もうひとり見つかった失踪者は、
そこにいるんだけど……

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_JOHNDOE2068_000_0043<tab>...
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_0044<tab>He's been robbed of his ability to speak, same as the Near Eastern youth.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_0044<tab>以前、捕縛した「近東風の若者」と同じ状態……。
おまけにだ……なんと、この遺体と瓜ふたつの容姿ときた！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_0045<tab>And that's not the strangest thing! Look, the living man and the dead are alike as peas in a pod! They both match descriptions of <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var> missing person. Are they twins? Cousins!?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_0045<tab>どうやら、拐われた失踪者のようなんだけど……
双子のようにそっくりなふたりの男性が、ひとりは自失状態で、
もうひとりは亡くなってる……もう、わけわかんないよ！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_0046<tab>The facts are ours. What we want for now is a story to make sense of them. And unfortunately, Chanene and I are both at our wit's end. It doubtless goes without saying, but your help in tracking down clues would be appreciated.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_0046<tab>解決すべき事柄が一度に増えて、オレたちもてんやわんやだ！
同じ姿の男性がなぜふたりいたのか……
すまないが、君は、この謎の手がかりを追ってくれないか？

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_0047<tab>We have one lead: a personal log, found on the dead man. He wrote about a younger sister working in Tailfeather.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_0047<tab>実は、遺体で発見された男性は、日記を持っていてな。
彼には妹さんがいて、この時期は、高地ドラヴァニアの、
「テイルフェザー」に出稼ぎにいっているようなんだ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_0048<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, could you speak with her? She should know of her brother's death. And I'd like to know if he did have a twin.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_0048<tab>「失踪者の妹」に日記を見せて、話を聞いてみてほしい。
……双子のお兄さんがいるのかどうかも、な。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_0060<tab>I cannot for the life of me see how we're going to make sense of this!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_0060<tab>双子のようにそっくりなふたりの男性が、ひとりは自失状態で、
もうひとりは亡くなってる……もう、わけわかんないよ！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_65<tab>It must be difficult, to learn of your brother's death from a stranger.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_65<tab>実は、遺体で発見された男性は、日記を持っていてな。
彼には妹さんがいて、この時期は、高地ドラヴァニアの、
「テイルフェザー」に出稼ぎにいっているようなんだ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_66<tab>But then again, it's possible they were not on good terms. She <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> move all the way to Tailfeather, after all.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_66<tab>「失踪者の妹」に日記を見せて、話を聞いてみてほしい。
……双子のお兄さんがいるのかどうかもな。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_DEADMANSSISTER_000_080<tab>Hm? Are you talkin' to me? What's this about, then?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_DEADMANSSISTER_000_080<tab>あんた、何さ？
え……見てほしいものがある？

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_DEADMANSSISTER_000_090<tab>Dead, is he? Hmph. This <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> his log. But I don't know who done for him. All I can say is he got what was comin'. I cut all ties with him years back.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_DEADMANSSISTER_000_090<tab>……兄貴が、遺体になって見つかった？
そう……たしかに、あいつの日記に間違いないと思うよ。
ひどく粗暴な兄貴で、ずいぶん前に縁を切ったけどさ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_DEADMANSSISTER_000_091<tab>No, he didn't have no other siblin's! I've got no idea who it was you found him with, but the realm don't need more than one of the bastard! Keep the soddin' journal─I'd only burn it.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_DEADMANSSISTER_000_091<tab>ハァ、兄貴とそっくりの男が同時に見つかったって？
……双子？　あんなヤツ、ふたりもいてたまるかっての！
この日記も返すよ、あんたらで好きに処分しな！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_100<tab>Whew... Moving those barrels was <var 1A 02 /var>hard<var 1A 01 /var> work! We only just got back now.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_100<tab>おかえり！
……で、「失踪者の妹」には、会えたのかな？

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_120<tab>She didn't want the journal? Well, all the more evidence for us I suppose. May I have it back?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_120<tab>……なに、妹さんは、日記を受け取らなかった？
形見の品だってのに、ずいぶん冷え切った関係なんだな。
なら、オレが預かっておこう。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_130<tab>Confound it, who did we find with the dead man if not his twin? We'll just have to press the Lalafellin fellow all the harder!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_130<tab>……そうか、男性に双子の兄弟はいなかったか。
結局、失踪者と瓜ふたつの遺体の正体は、謎のままだ。
あの、ならず者が容疑を認めりゃ、何か聞けそうだが……。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_131<tab>A witness saw him loading the body-laden barrels into the carriage. The culprit denies this, on the basis that he doesn't have the strength.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_131<tab>あの野郎が、チョコボ・キャリッジに、
遺体の入っていた樽を積むのを見たという目撃者もいるんだが……
非力なララフェル族には無理だって、本人は否認してやがってな。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_132<tab>Which is a proper alibi, in all fairness. I couldn't lift the barrels when they were <var 1A 02 /var>empty<var 1A 01 /var>. That said, if there were some alchemy involved, it's not impossible. Aren't there potions to imbue someone with ungodly strength?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_132<tab>実際、無理だよ、空っぽの樽でさえ大変なんだから！
あっ……でも、犯人は錬金術を使うのか……。
もしかして、一時的に怪力になれる薬を使ったとか？

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_133<tab>Yes, Severian mentioned something like that to me once. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, might you brew such a draconian potion of strength? If we give it to Chanene, we can have her try to lift the barrels the men were in. That will determine whether our culprit's story holds water.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_133<tab>……聞いたことがあるな……たしか「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2314E01 /var>」だ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、製作を頼めないか？
ララフェル族のチャネネに渡して、再現実験をしてみたい。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SYSTEM_900_000<tab>In order to complete this quest, you must have learned the advanced recipes contained within <var 1A 02 /var>Master Alchemist III<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_SYSTEM_900_000<tab>「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2314E01 /var>」を製作するためには、
「錬成秘伝書:第3巻」の修得が必要です。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_140<tab>I must say, using a draconian potion of strength to recreate what happened is <var 1A 02 /var>exciting<var 1A 01 /var>, isn't it?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_140<tab>「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2314E01 /var>」の製作を頼めないか？
ララフェル族のチャネネに渡して、再現実験をしてみたい。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_160<tab>We'll start the experiment just as soon as you've made the draconian potion of strength.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_160<tab>「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2314E01 /var>」ができあがったら、
さっそく、実験を始めるからね！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_170<tab>Now, the question is whether a Lalafell can─under the influence of a draconian potion of strength─lift a barrel with a Hyur inside.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_170<tab>さあ、再現実験の開始といこう！
大柄なヒューラン族の遺体が詰まった重い樽を、
ララフェル族にも動かすことができるかどうか。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_171<tab>It wouldn't do to stuff the men back into the barrels, so we'll use water to approximate their weight. Now, Chanene, whenever you're ready.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_171<tab>樽には遺体のかわりに、多量の水が張ってある。
……チャネネ、「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2314E01 /var>」は飲んだな？
そこの樽を動かしてみろ！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_172<tab>HAH! I did it! I lifted them! This is <var 1A 02 /var>amazing<var 1A 01 /var> stuff, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Can I have some mo─
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CHANENE_000_172<tab>見てみて、私にも運べたよっ！
錬金術ってすごいね！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_173<tab>You, sir, are a damned liar! The eyewitness saw you moving the barrels, and we've shown you were more than capable of doing it with the right potion!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_173<tab>おい、そこの野郎！
これと同じ要領で遺体を運んだろう！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CRIMINAL02068_000_174<tab>It's true, I did it! Some old alchemist paid me to do his dirty work, and dump the body...but that's all, I swear!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CRIMINAL02068_000_174<tab>ちぇっ……ああ、そのとおりだよ！
錬金術師のジイサンに雇われて、実行部隊をやってたのさ。
……で、死体の処理を任されたはいいが、ヘマやってこのザマだ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CRIMINAL02068_000_175<tab>The man, he's insane, and he don't like loose ends! He'll sew me mouth shut to keep me quiet, then stab me with the needle! I'll spill all I know, just please, protect me!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CRIMINAL02068_000_175<tab>こうなったら全部話すから、俺を保護してくれ……！
さもなきゃ雇い主が、口封じに俺を殺しにきちまう！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_176<tab>Only if you talk. From the beginning─why were there two identical men at the crime scene?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_176<tab>取引か……いいだろう。
そのかわり、いますぐ話せ。
なぜ現場に、瓜ふたつの姿の男性がふたりいた？

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CRIMINAL02068_000_177<tab>That's how he <var 1A 02 /var>made<var 1A 01 /var> them, see, with Allagan magicks! He's snatching folk from their homes, because he needs them to practice! “Clones,” I think he called the copies. Aye, clones!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CRIMINAL02068_000_177<tab>あ、あれは人造生命体……「クローン」というものらしい……。
古代アラグ文明の秘法を再現し、拐った男とそっくりの男を、
錬金術で創りだしたんだってよ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CRIMINAL02068_000_178<tab>That's it, I swear! Now, you'll keep your word? The bit about stabbing me with a needle, that wasn't no jest! He's got no compunction with killing. Please, please, <var 1A 02 /var>please<var 1A 01 /var>...
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_CRIMINAL02068_000_178<tab>なあ、ちゃんと話したんだから、オレをかくまってくれよ！
「他言すれば、お前にお前を殺させる」って、そう言われたんだ！
あのジイサン、殺しなんて屁とも思っちゃいねえんだから！

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_179<tab>“Clones”? What in the seven hells...? Oh, yes, consider yourself protected. Chanene?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_179<tab>古代アラグの秘法……
人造生命体「クローン」……だと……？

source: TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_180<tab>I can scarcely believe my ears, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but if even half of what the scoundrel told us is true, then there is a catastrophe in the brewing. We must put a stop to this!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC580_02068_WILTWAEK_000_180<tab>……ちっとばかし、ヤバそうなことになってきたな。
こいつは、次も締めてかかる必要がありそうだぞ。
